A genie suddenly appears before Aladdin's eyes. The genie immediately grants Aladdin three wishes. Aladdin first wishes for enough gold to buy the beautiful princess he has long dreamed of having as his wife. As soon as the genie grants Aladdin his first wish for gold, Aladdin becomes extremely rich and wealthy overnight! 20 years later, in 2021, at age 89, still extremely rich and wealthy overnight again after granting him his second wish for gold! Aladdin's third wish is to be able to go anywhere he wants on earth, at any time. The genie immediately grants Aladdin his third wish for freedom. Aladdin suddenly disappears from the world of the living, and becomes a spirit that can go anywhere it wants on earth, at any time!
